I have enjoyed the game a lot over the years and I've had my money's worth, but the most recent update has caused me to uninstall and I wouldn't recommend the game to anyone in the current state. 

It is a bore fest for killers now with such a huge amount of perks available to slow the game down that it makes it entirely trivial. The movement changes to survivors are hugely limiting and it is now the case that in every trial I play as a survivor I am downed by killers who are nowhere near me.  When you remove so many elements of skill and individual play you remove any reason to want to play. 

I hope it gets back to being playable and enjoyable again one day.

i dont recommend this game and big streamer doesnt recommend it either: there are so many problems with this game. but the biggest problem is BHVR who is lazy asf, doesnt hear to his community and what are the results? trash. a game with a HUGE potential got kicked in the ass only cuz BHVR wanna make money and doesnt care about their own game. new update is not a update in my opinion its more like a back to the realese or ''lets get this game back to early access'' movement feels and looks trash, new HUD is shit you have to move your heard 50000 times to the left, right, left right, instead of keeping old HUD which everyone loved and everything is on one side in the corner. THOUSENDS of THOUSENDS bugs and glitches, hitboxes bigger then never before cuz of the servers are so trash, it has a great fiture: the lobby simulator which i like kappa. the unbalancednes is so freaking huge in this game, you cant even describe. killer which are not playable without perkz and addons and killer so strong you dont even need. and the gen speed is ridicoulus. I DONT RECOMMEND YOU THIS GAME, AND DONT BUY IT PLEASE! thank you <3

Terrible devs that don't listen to the community and can't balance shit for their lives. It's fun for the first 80 hours when no one has any idea what they are doing but then becomes a painfully bad game where the killer gets bullied by survivor with overpowered perks from paid DLCs. If you go against an optimal SWF then there is literally nothing you can do and will lose everytime as this game is balanced by a team of delusional idiots that understand that if they just release new cosmetics everyone will shut up for a week about how terrible this game is. Never buy this game unless either the devs fix the fucking game or you unironically hate yourself. Better yet, take the 20 dollars and donate it to a Cancer research charity to help the millions of people that got it from this god awful game.

It just keeps getting better and better. It is very suspenseful and you are fighting for your life. In the thrilling game of Dead By Daylight, you get all the chills and adrenaline in one.

It is safe to say...I am HOOKED on this game ;D ahahahaha, sorry. DBD jokes for days. 
I never thought I would dive into this game as deeply as I have. I think the fact there is a character level & rank really makes you want to keep playing. 
What started as "i'll never play that" turned into me playing it almost daily since I started.
It does have its fair share of bugs/glitches & I can't seem to go at least one session without playing against multiple bot killers/hackers/disconnects. The creators have been working hard on lots of updates/changes though so I am sure with time most things will get fixed! (ALL games have issues) 

P.S: Fair warning that you will come across more bullies than you'd like. 
Some are just very competitive as where I just play the game for fun! So have funnnnn :D

It use to be a really great game.  I met a lot of good people playing this, but not anymore.  It's really really gotten toxic and every update is worse than the one before.  Just look on YouTube for bugs and glitches.  Problem is, the bugs and bad hit boxes have been a things for years and the devs just won't fix them.

I had over 850+ hours in this game and really feels like a waste to uninstall it but the community has gotten so bad with people camping hooks it just makes the game not fun to play anymore.  I'd look for something else unless you just don't have a soul.

The last update Totally ruined the survivor game experience, there is no chance at all to gain a point if you die. I loved this game but they are trying to make it harder and harder to the point its not enjoyable anymore.
